items.title: Visa: Consumer Trends Remain Solid Heading Into The Q3 Report
items.description: Visa's recent earnings beat, robust guidance, and continued EPS growth outlook support its premium valuation. Read why I reiterate my buy rating on V stock.

items.title: Polen Global Growth Portfolio Q2 2025 Commentary
items.description: During the quarter, Polen Global Growth Portfolio returned 8.16% gross of fees (7.87% net of fees) compared to 11.53% for the Index. Read more here.
